welcome_step_description: In the following you will be given a short introduction
success_received: We received your data and will process it soon
check_uploads: Please check your uploads and submit finally
choose_or_add: either choose from the list or add an entry
no_entry_add: no entry yet, to add an entry press +
first_visit_title: Do you want to use this token?
want_to_use_token_question: The token can only be used or one application on one device. If you proceed, the token will be linked with this browser.

error.enum: must be at least one of the allowed values

fellow_applicants.not_eligible: You can obtain a separate form access link for family members who do not belonging to your immediate family after submitting this data.
